snippet: Preet Bharara, the top federal prosecutor in Manhattan whose office highlighted violence against teenage inmates at the jail, said he would sue New York City, if necessary, to force reform.
abstract: Preet Bharara, United States attorney for Southern District of New York, reasserts he expects reforms to be made at Rikers Island and is prepared to sue New York City, if necessary, to accomplish them; his office highlighted violence against teenage inmates at the jail.
lead_paragraph: Preet Bharara, the top federal prosecutor in Manhattan whose office highlighted violence against teenage inmates at the jail, said he would sue New York City, if necessary, to force reform.

headline.main: Reaffirming Vow, Prosecutor Says Rikers Reform Will Happen ‘One Way or Another’
headline.print_headline: Reaffirming Vow, Prosecutor Says Rikers Reform Will Happen ‘One Way or Another’
